data.text: @ellis_sprocket @TSNCurling @CurlingCanada Starve the players? Keep guys secluded from society? Dramatic much?!
@adam_lamers12 @pdwilkie @TSNCurling @CurlingCanada I wish there was a 🤣 for your stupid tweets.
@TylerPenner @TSNCurling @CurlingCanada Yes, thankfully he isn't making the decision
@TSNCurling @CurlingCanada Give it up already , nobody cares . Testing should be illegal already .
@TSNCurling @CurlingCanada Anti-masker and anti-vaxxers have infiltrated curling…….along with their attitude.
@adam_lamers12 @TSNCurling @CurlingCanada How very Trumpian and kenneyesque of you.

@WjmkJan @TSNCurling @CurlingCanada @MBGov @HStefansonMB Then don't.  It's your choice.  The "Science" now shows it is time to live again.  Also if you choose to go out you can choose to wear a mask and if you are that concerned, do it.
@MissKarlee4 @TSNCurling @CurlingCanada Make them wear masks then. If the Olympic women hockey players wore them to play, surely the men curlers can.

@TSNCurling @CurlingCanada And then as of March 15 our brilliant MB government is lifting mask mandates and if you test positive you no longer need to isolate. Utterly stupid! Don’t think I will leave the house! #COVID19 @MBGov @HStefansonMB
@adam_lamers12 @pdwilkie @TSNCurling @CurlingCanada Good thing it's not yours to make.
